answers.answer: Hi there,I cannot confirm anything without an external examination. The few possibilities based on information shared by you are that it could be eczema, dermatitis; bacterial or fungal skin infection etc.Staphylococcus aureus can cause folliculitis.Other causes could be eczema, varicose dermatitis etc. In diabetes mellitus due to increased presence of sugar in the blood rashes on the extremities and leg sores are a common concern. If you have itching application of calamine lotion on the legs may help. Seeking the opinion of an expert dermatologist may help.Take care and kind regards!
